products.title: Mesa Monitor Stand - (Blue)
products.description: Elevate your monitor as well as your workstation experience with Mesa Monitor Stand! Your ultimate ally for productive working, it is a perfect coalition of design and function. It's thoughtful design frees up valuable space on your desk and elevated height supports improved working posture, making it ergonomically friendly. Durable, matte-finish aluminium gives the stand design a clean modern expression to complement contemporary device designs. Natural oakwood tray softens the look and adds a warm feel while the colours bring the fun element

products.title: Morph Foldable Deskmat with Laptop Stand
products.description: Inspired to build workplace accessories that integrate ergonomic functions and aesthetic details, our product design team achieved a unique feat with this Morph Foldable Deskmat with Laptop Stand. A Desk Mat with a built-in laptop stand to provide optimal sitting posture support in a single unified silhouette. Designed for people with a dynamic lifestyle, it comes with a compact, three-fold design that makes it easy to fit it in your backpack and lets you setup your remote workspace - anywhere, anytime.

products.title: Cirque Phone and Pen Stand - (Blue)
products.description: Accessorise your desk with the elegant CIRQUE Phone and Pen Stand. Made from natural ashwood, the phone stand can securely hold your phone while the pen stand is adequately spacious to hold a stack of pens, pencils and other small desk accessories. An impeccable match for any busy work desk.

products.title: Arete Laptop Stand - (Ivory)
products.description: Add superior stability, improved posture, comfort and lots of character to your desk with this precisely designed Arete Laptop Stand. The elevation of the aluminium panel ensures that your device is positioned at an angle to match your eye-level and support your working posture while its sleek and open design ensures effortless user experience. The durable matte-finish aluminium and smooth leatherite cladding gives the stand a clean modern expression to complement contemporary device designs.

products.title: Brown-Navy SHIFT Desk Mat
products.description: Make a shift in your desk accessories and create an ambient surface on your workstation with this handcrafted, soft-grain leatherite SHIFT Desk Mat. Designed in striking dual-colour combinations, it can be put to use as an accessory around your home for friction-free movement and smooth operation. This classic soft-touch leather desk mat is perfect to hold your laptop or keyboard smoothly and it also enables swift movement of your mouse

products.title: Cirque Phone and Pen Stand - (Red)
products.description: Accessorise your desk with the elegant CIRQUE Phone and Pen Stand. Made from natural ashwood, the phone stand can securely hold your phone while the pen stand is adequately spacious to hold a stack of pens, pencils and other small desk accessories. An impeccable match for any busy work desk

products.title: Mount Adjustable Phone Stand - (Green)
products.description: Tactfully designed for superior experience, Mount Adjustable Phone Stand, stands out in terms of utility and craftsmanship. Fashioned from natural ashwood and highly durable Aluminium metal, the stand comes with a circular wooden bolt at the back and a rotating panel at the bottom for adjustable height and angle capabilities to accommodate different viewing needs of users. Simply adjust the bolt and choose your preferred viewing angle while watching videos, browsing, or face-timing

products.title: Striate Wooden Tray
products.description: Align your work desk essentials with a skillfully crafted Striate Wooden Tray. Along with separate space for your knick-knacks, this tray also has ingeniously altered surface in the form of waves or indents to hold your stationery. The product is envisioned to be a convenient solution to declutter your desk and organise other small desk essentials such as - pens, phone, air-pods, notepad, pen-drive and more.

products.title: Coal-Grey SHIFT Mouse Pad
products.description: Make a shift in your workspace and create an ambient surface on your desk with this handcrafted, soft-grain leatherite SHIFT Mouse Pad. Designed in striking dual-colour combinations by in-house artisans, this classic soft-touch leatherite mouse pad enables swift movement of your mouse while you are working or just browsing.

products.title: Coal-Grey SHIFT Desk Mat
products.description: Make a shift in your desk accessories and create an ambient surface on your workstation with this handcrafted, soft-grain leatherite SHIFT Desk Mat. Designed in striking dual-colour combinations, it can be put to use as an accessory around your home for friction-free movement and smooth operation. This classic soft-touch leather desk mat is perfect to hold your laptop or keyboard smoothly and it also enables swift movement of your mouse

products.title: Conoid Universal Magnetic Wireless Charging Stand (15W)
products.description: Conoid Universal Magnetic Wireless Charging Stand is designed to give a seamless, wireless charging experience. When placed on your work desk, it can power your phone while you continue working or watching videos. Along with a hands-free experience, this universal charger allows you to rotate your device in any orientation. Additionally, its metallic finish makes it aesthetically pleasing to place it on the bedside, office desk or home workstation.

products.title: DailyObjects SURGE™ PD GaN 33W Dual Port Charger
products.description: A coalition of fast charging and compact design, DailyObjects SURGE™ PD 33W GaN Tech Dual Port Charger is the smallest fast-charging solution to power all your personal devices - latest android/ios phones, iPad, Tablet and Macbook Air M1 & M2. This 33 Watt Charger is powered by (GaN) technology that makes it super compact and efficient.

products.title: DailyObjects SURGE™ 2-In-1 Universal Magnetic Wireless Charging Station (18W)
products.description: Modern, minimalist, and effortless! Such is the experience of DailyObjects SURGE™ 2-in-1 Universal Magnetic Wireless Charging Station. This device combines the power of dual wireless chargers and offers a hands-free experience. Equipped with magnetic capabilities, the charging station allows an adjustable mount to your phone in any orientation so you can easily access it. Whereas, the silicone base of the charger acts as a wireless pad for your AirPods 2nd and 3rd genertion, AirPods Pro or any other Qi enabled earbuds.

products.title: White Clock & Dock Charging Station
products.description: The Clock & Dock Charging Station is designed to simplify and streamline your life at home and workplace. The versatile Charging Station is equipped with an alarm clock that allows you to set two alarms at the same time and three charging ports to power your phone, Kindle, iPad & more. Its ingenious design adds to the aesthetics of the surroundings and makes it perfect to be plugged and placed anywhere you like.

products.title: DailyObjects SURGE™ 4-in-1 Universal Braided Charging Cable
products.description: 4-in-1 Nylon Braided Charging Cable is everything you need, to charge most of the tech you own! Get moving from the inconvenience caused by overflow of cables all around and power up your iPad, iPhone, MacBook and Android devices, no sweat. The ultimate solution to keep away from carrying a stack of cables everywhere you go!

products.title: Black Clock & Dock Charging Station
products.description: The Clock & Dock Charging Station is designed to simplify and streamline your life at home and workplace. The versatile Charging Station is equipped with an alarm clock that allows you to set two alarms at the same time and three charging ports to power your phone, Kindle, iPad & more. Its ingenious design adds to the aesthetics of the surroundings and makes it perfect to be plugged and placed anywhere you like

products.title: DailyObjects SURGE™ 3-In-1 Magnetic Wireless Charging Station (25W)
products.description: Keep your devices flawlessly organised and change the way you charge them with the new-age DailyObjects SURGE™ 3-in-1 Magnetic Wireless Charging Station. The device features a built- in charging module to charge your Qi enabled Phone, Apple Watch, AirPods Pro and AirPods 2nd and 3rd generation. Designed in aluminium alloy, it is also compatible with all Qi enabled Smartphones and Earbuds. All you need to do is place them on the charger and experience efficient charging

products.title: QUAD Universal Wireless Charging Deck (15W)
products.description: Dive into the extraordinary wireless charging experience with QUAD Universal Wireless Charging Deck! Built with high-grade tough ABS body and soft-touch leatherite, the charger is designed to offer extremely efficient and convenient charging for all Qi-enabled phones and earbuds. Get fully geared up with a charging chip that delivers the perfect style quotient and allows you the flexibility to charge your devices with or without the wire.

products.title: Walnut Brown SnapOn Envelope Sleeve For Macbook Pro 35.56cm (14 inch)
products.description: Handcrafted from premium, pebbled leatherite, the SnapOn Envelope Sleeve protects your MacBook from scratches and bumps. Its ultra-slim design makes it travel friendly and smooth finish adds more suave to your already elegant personality.

products.title: Space Blue SnapOn Envelope Sleeve For Macbook Pro 40.64cm (16 inch)
products.description: Handcrafted from premium, pebbled leatherite, the SnapOn Envelope Sleeve protects your MacBook from scratches and bumps. Its ultra-slim design makes it travel friendly and smooth finish adds more suave to your already elegant personality.

products.title: Black Urban Classic Briefcase Bag
products.description: Complement your work day look with a classic modern workwear, the Urban Classic Briefcase Bag and make sure you walk into work, in ample style. The modern silhouette, durable choice of exterior as well as spacious interior with extra-functional compartments assure its effortless compatibility with your modern lifestyle. Handcrafted with premium leatherite, scratch- resistant felt and soft-touch poly suede, the bag offers dependable safety to all your tech accessories.

products.title: Blue Plunge Apple WatchBand (42/44/45/49mm)
products.description: The lightweight yet rugged Plunge Apple Watchband is water and dirt resistant which makes it a fitting choice for your adventure and recreational sporting pursuits. Made from fluoroelastomer in cylindrical construction for a perfect grip and a secure fit. It also comes with an adjustable strap keeper that lets you hold the hanging end of the strap close and tight.

products.title: Starlight Ridge Loop Apple WatchBand (38/40/41mm)
products.description: Complement your active lifestyle with the stylish, flexible and widely adjustable Ridge Loop Apple WatchBand. Crafted with durable yarns, this dual-layered, single strap makes for a must-wear accessory for every place you go- from adventurous trips to your daily runs. The G-hook closure of the watchband easily slides in the loop and offers a secure fit along with dependable protection. Compatible with Apple Watch Series 1-8 & SE (38/40/41 & 42/44/45), it is made of a material that�s flexible ensuring easy installation and removal.

products.title: Green Ridge Loop Apple WatchBand (38/40/41mm)
products.description: Complement your active lifestyle with the stylish, flexible and widely adjustable Ridge Loop Apple WatchBand. Crafted with durable yarns, this dual-layered, single strap makes for a must-wear accessory for every place you go- from adventurous trips to your daily runs. The G-hook closure of the watchband easily slides in the loop and offers a secure fit along with dependable protection. Compatible with Apple Watch Series 1-8 & SE (38/40/41 & 42/44/45), it is made of a material that�s flexible ensuring easy installation and removal.

products.title: Black-Gray Two Tone Silicone Apple WatchBand (38/40/41mm)
products.description: Rejuvenate the look of your smartwatch with a watchband fashioned with silicone in two contrasting colours. The two-toned design adds character to your watch while the soft-touch silicone reckons with skin sores during intense workout sessions and on a regular day. It immaculately accounts for a gear that perseveres with you while providing the extreme comfort and class.

products.title: Blue Ribbed Fit Apple Watch Series Case with Screen Protector (40mm)
products.description: Choose statement making Apple watch protection with ribbed-design polycarbonate case exterior along with tempered glass protector for 360 degree integrated protection from scratches, bumps and breakage.

products.title: Black Tough Fit Apple Watch Series Case (44mm)
products.description: Encase your valuable Apple Watch in this Tough Fit Case for well-rounded and long-lasting protection. Moulded from strong and flexible TPU and alloy, the case offers dependable defense against everyday scratches, bumps, dents and breakage.

products.title: Black-Orange Dual Lock Apple WatchBand with Protective Bumper Case (40mm)
products.description: Reliable and resilient, the Dual Lock Apple WatchBand can keep up with the most adventurous times of your day. Its modern and sleek construction gives it an athletic look while the design is engineered to withstand a multitude of bumps & scratches. Compatible with Apple Watch Series 1-6 & SE (40/44mm), the lightweight design of this WatchBand offers comfortable wear.

products.title: Army Green Athletic Fit Apple Watch Series Case with Screen Protector (44mm)
products.description: Secure round-the-clock protection for your Apple watch with this Athletic Fit Apple Watch Case that comes with in-built screen protection. The case exterior is made from a combination of flexible TPU and tough PC, to resist high-impact damage while the tempered glass screen protector ensures your watch screen is secure at all times.

products.title: Black Clear 2.0 Apple WatchBand with Protective Bumper Case (38/40mm)
products.description: A transformation of your Apple Watch into something that goes beyond expectations to offer great protection and a flawless, utilitarian design. Fashioned from TPU, Clear 2.0 Apple WatchBand is the' pick for serious shock-deflection. Compatible with Apple Watch Series 1-6 & SE(38/40 mm), the clear watchband also gives a crystalline look to your watch.

products.title: Rosegold Sleek Fit Apple Watch Series Case with Screen Protector (44mm)
products.description: Designed to add elegant protection to your tech, Sleek Fit Case's minimal design, ultra-thin frame and precise cut-outs preserve the complete look and feel of the watch. Polycarbonate case exterior along with tempered glass protector for 360 degree integrated protection from scratches, bumps and breakage.

products.title: Black Align A5 Hardcover Notebook 2.0
products.description: Simple and elegantly designed Align A5 Hardcover Notebook 2.0 stands out for its versatile design elements. Precisely stitched leather loops, pockets and incredibly touchable outside texture will make you reach out for this notebook every day, every time. Align your thoughts, feelings and get ahead of your to-do lists while adding new value to your daily life! Align also makes a perfect gifting option for a stationery lover friend!

cart.description: Elevate your monitor as well as your workstation experience with Mesa Monitor Stand! Your ultimate ally for productive working, it is a perfect coalition of design and function. It's thoughtful design frees up valuable space on your desk and elevated height supports improved working posture, making it ergonomically friendly. Durable, matte-finish aluminium gives the stand design a clean modern expression to complement contemporary device designs. Natural oakwood tray softens the look and adds a warm feel while the colours bring the fun element

cart.title: Morph Foldable Deskmat with Laptop Stand
cart.description: Inspired to build workplace accessories that integrate ergonomic functions and aesthetic details, our product design team achieved a unique feat with this Morph Foldable Deskmat with Laptop Stand. A Desk Mat with a built-in laptop stand to provide optimal sitting posture support in a single unified silhouette. Designed for people with a dynamic lifestyle, it comes with a compact, three-fold design that makes it easy to fit it in your backpack and lets you setup your remote workspace - anywhere, anytime.

cart.title: Arete Laptop Stand - (Ivory)
cart.description: Add superior stability, improved posture, comfort and lots of character to your desk with this precisely designed Arete Laptop Stand. The elevation of the aluminium panel ensures that your device is positioned at an angle to match your eye-level and support your working posture while its sleek and open design ensures effortless user experience. The durable matte-finish aluminium and smooth leatherite cladding gives the stand a clean modern expression to complement contemporary device designs.

cart.title: Brown-Navy SHIFT Desk Mat
cart.description: Make a shift in your desk accessories and create an ambient surface on your workstation with this handcrafted, soft-grain leatherite SHIFT Desk Mat. Designed in striking dual-colour combinations, it can be put to use as an accessory around your home for friction-free movement and smooth operation. This classic soft-touch leather desk mat is perfect to hold your laptop or keyboard smoothly and it also enables swift movement of your mouse
